@pops87pl
No... that is the very same link I linked, and you can't seem to read it correctly either.

This is episode 21 in the aired order, it is episode 15 in the production order.

Next episode is obviously episode 22 in the aired order, but it is also episode 22 in the production order, not 20. Episode 20 has already aired... both the production and the aired order. If you can't count, 22 comes after 21, 21 comes after 20...

The next episode is 22 - Fry Am the Egg Man (S06BE09) it will August 11, 2011.
